hibernate-mapping.query: select d from Dialog d where d.Module.Application.Id = :applicationId and d.InterfaceView is not null
select d from Dialog d where d.Module.Application.Id = :applicationId
select d from Dialog d where d.Module.Application.Id = :applicationId and d.InterfaceView is not null and d.Type = :dialogType
select d from Dialog d where d.Module.Application.Id = :applicationId and d.InterfaceView is not null and d.Type = :dialogType

select d from Dialog d where d.Module.Application.Id = :applicationId and d.Module.Name like :moduleName and d.Name like :dialogName and coalesce(d.OriginalDialogName,'%') like :originalDialogName and d.Title like :title order by d.Name
select d from Dialog d where d.Module.Application.Id = :applicationId and d.Module.Name = :moduleName and d.Name = :dialogName
select d from Dialog d where d.Module.Id = :moduleId
